text: John Desmond Hargreaves (25 January 1924 – 14 February 2015 ) was the Burnett- Fletcher Professor of History at the University of Aberdeen. Hargreaves was noted for his work on the history of Africa; its colonisation and de- colonisation. His career at Aberdeen began in 1954 when he was appointed as a lecturer in History. Hargreaves received his chair in 1962. Hargreaves went part-time in 1982 and retired in 1985.Bridges, Roy (1997) John D.
